unnormalised: **Home Loan Schemes Get a Festive Boost - Time to Buy that Dream Home?**
normalised: **Home Loan Schemes Get a Festive Boost - Time to Buy that Dream Home?**

unnormalised: Thinking of finally buying that flat in Bandra or that bungalow near your ancestral home in Kerala? Well, good news! Lenders are rolling out some sweet home loan schemes, just in time for the Onam season!
normalised: Thinking of finally buying that flat in Bandra or that bungalow near your ancestral home in Kerala? Well, good news! Lenders are rolling out some sweet home loan schemes, just in time for the Onam season!

unnormalised: Several banks, including HDFC and ICICI Bank, are offering reduced interest rates – we’re talking rates starting as low as 8.5% for eligible borrowers. Plus, some are waiving processing fees altogether! Think of the biryani you could buy with that saved money!
normalised: Several banks, including H D F C and I C I C I Bank, are offering reduced interest rates – we’re talking rates starting as low as eight point five percent for eligible borrowers. Plus, some are waiving processing fees altogether! Think of the biryani you could buy with that saved money!

unnormalised: These schemes are especially attractive for first-time homebuyers in cities like Chennai and Bangalore. Many are also targeting those looking to refinance existing loans with better terms.
normalised: These schemes are especially attractive for first-time home buyers in cities like Chennai and Bangalore. Many are also targeting those looking to refinance existing loans with better terms.

unnormalised: But remember to shop around! Don't just jump at the first offer you see. Compare rates, fees, and tenures carefully. Also, keep an eye on the fine print, especially regarding pre-payment penalties.
normalised: But remember to shop around! Do not just jump at the first offer you see. Compare rates, fees, and tenures carefully. Also, keep an eye on the fine print, especially regarding pre-payment penalties.

unnormalised: Experts recommend a down payment of at least 20% for optimal loan terms. So, start saving!
normalised: Experts recommend a down payment of at least twenty percent for optimal loan terms. So, start saving!

unnormalised: With the festive season upon us and these tempting offers, now might be the perfect time to finally make that real estate dream a reality!
normalised: With the festive season upon us and these tempting offers, now might be the perfect time to finally make that real estate dream a reality!
